summary: Completed testing of logo upload functionality and send invoice features. Logo upload and display system is working correctly across settings page and public invoice pages. Send invoice functionality exists but requires SMTP configuration.

configuration_issues.issue: Returns 400 'SMTP not configured' when attempting to send invoice emails
configuration_issues.impact: Send invoice feature cannot send actual emails
configuration_issues.note: This is a configuration issue, not a bug. SMTP settings need to be configured in admin settings.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no auth token provided

passed_tests: Logo URL formatting for public access
Public logo serving with security restrictions
Send invoice endpoint exists and accessible
Public invoice page structure and error handling
Settings page logo upload section display
action_item_for_main_agent: Configure SMTP settings in admin panel to enable actual email sending for the Send Invoice feature. All core functionality is working correctly - logo upload, display, and send invoice button are functional.
